data.title: Residential Solar, Clean Energy Storage & EV Charging
data.meta_description: Go solar with SunPower, the top-rated solar company in the U.S. and America's provider of high-quality, reliable home solar and renewable-energy solutions.
data.text:
Solar Battery Storage

Bigger savings, more control.

Whether you want to maximize your solar savings or keep the lights shining bright during an outage,*The ability to provide electricity during an outage will vary based on the amount of energy stored in the battery, wattage and duration of use of devices/appliances connected to the system, the batteryâ€™s ability to recharge during daylight hours, and other factors. Additional hardware may be required for powering your HVAC system. Storage system should not be relied upon as a single source of power for critical medical devices. solar storage systems help you take control of your energy use.

How Many Solar Panels Do You Need?

From your reason for going solar to the size of your roof, the answer depends on a number of factors.

More Affordable Than You Think

Think solar is too expensive? It may cost less than your current electricity bill! Plus, qualified customers can start with $0 down.
